column3: I'm not convinced that this is worth changing at this point, at the least it may conflict with other wallet interface changes in process.
> it may conflict with other wallet interface change\n\n@laanwj I believe there are none? Anyway wallet interface is pretty new and if this is a good change then the sooner the better.

Ok in that case concept ack...
